title: BEING HUMAN by GrimGriz - an ASP response
description:
Finally! An entry into the Alien Salience Project from GrimGriz zodself.

From the Beggars & Buskers strem: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZEAnkKUDTw

Click this link
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLlYtuOmeuiNt2fU5iBWjmn34ZVElvTXtk
and then you should be able to save your own video to the collaborative playlist
(i'm sure there's instructions on those somewhere...)


There's a Hoodie with Goose on it you can buy now - I knew you'd want to know
https://www.etsy.com/listing/1340501337/there-is-no-agency-unisex-zipper-hoodie
(coupon code in the hallway on the discord)

Tell mudhut to put the Peterson Piece on a Neck Gaiter!
https://mudhutillustration.com/shop/

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/grimgriz
Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/2bZtrzTYza
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz
and this as an alternative method:  https://www.buymeacoffee.com/grimgriz
https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
